ptserver.util

Class ServerUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptserver.util.ServerUtility

  • public class ServerUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing helper methods used by the ptserver and/or Homer.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Anar Huseynov
    Accepted Rating:
    Red (ahuseyno)
    Proposed Rating:
    Red (ahuseyno)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String PROXY_SINK_ATTRIBUTE
      Attribute value indicating that the actor is a sink.
      static java.lang.String PROXY_SOURCE_ATTRIBUTE
      Attribute value indicating that the actor is a source.
      static java.lang.String REMOTE_ATTRIBUTE
      Attribute value indicating that the parent attribute is a remote attribute - its value needs to synchronized between client and server models.
      static java.lang.String REMOTE_OBJECT_TAG
      Attribute name indicating that the named object needs to be handled by the ProxyModelBuilder.

    • Method Detail

      • createMoMLParser

        public static MoMLParser createMoMLParser()
        Create and initialize a new MoMLParser. The parser would have BackwardCompatibility and RemoveGraphicalClasses filters. The RemoteGraphicalClasses would filter out only classes that are known not to be portable to be portable to Android.
        Returns:
        new MoMLParser with BackwardCompatibility and RemoveGraphicalClasses filters.

      • deepAttributeList

        public static java.util.List<Attribute> deepAttributeList(NamedObj container)
        Return the deep attribute list of the container in a depth first order.
        Parameters:
        container - the container to process.
        Returns:
        the deep attribute list of the container.

      • findRemoteAttributes

        public static void findRemoteAttributes(java.util.List<Attribute> attributeList,
                                        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Settable> remoteAttributeMap)
        Find all remote attributes of the model and add them to the remoteAttributeMap.
        Parameters:
        attributeList - the attribute list to search
        remoteAttributeMap - the map where the attributes need to be added.

      • isRemoteAttribute

        public static boolean isRemoteAttribute(Attribute attribute)
        Return true if the attribute is marked as remote attribute, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        attribute - the child attribute of the attribute to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the attribute is marked as remote attribute, false otherwise.

      • isTargetProxySink

        public static boolean isTargetProxySink(Attribute targetEntityAttribute)
        Return true if the attribute is marked as remote sink, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        targetEntityAttribute - the child attribute the source actor to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the attribute is marked as remote attribute, false otherwise.

      • isTargetProxySource

        public static boolean isTargetProxySource(Attribute targetEntityAttribute)
        Return true if the attribute is marked as remote source, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        targetEntityAttribute - the child attribute of the source actor to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the attribute is marked as remote attribute, false otherwise.

      • mergeModelWithLayout

        public static CompositeEntity mergeModelWithLayout(CompositeEntity model,
                                                   CompositeEntity layout,
                                                   java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Class<? extends Attribute>> classesToMerge,
                                                   java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> namedObjectsToMerge)
                                            throws IllegalActionException,
                                                   NameDuplicationException,
                                                   java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        Merge the model with layout.
        Parameters:
        model - The model to merge.
        layout - The layout to merge.
        classesToMerge - The classes that need to be merged.
        namedObjectsToMerge - The named objects that need to be merged.
        Returns:
        the merged model.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - if there is a problem merging the model.
        NameDuplicationException - if there is a problem merging the model.
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - if there is a problem merging the model.

      • mergeModelWithLayout

        public static CompositeEntity mergeModelWithLayout(java.net.URL modelURL,
                                                   java.net.URL layoutURL,
                                                   java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Class<? extends Attribute>> classesToMerge,
                                                   java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> namedObjectsToMerge)
                                            throws IllegalActionException,
                                                   NameDuplicationException,
                                                   java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        Merge the model with layout.
        Parameters:
        modelURL - The URL to the model.
        layoutURL - The URL to the layout.
        classesToMerge - The classes that need to be merged.
        namedObjectsToMerge - The named objects that need to be merged.
        Returns:
        the merged model.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - if there is a problem merging the model.
        NameDuplicationException - if there is a problem merging the model.
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - if there is a problem merging the model.

      • mergeModelWithLayout

        public static CompositeEntity mergeModelWithLayout(java.lang.String modelURL,
                                                   java.lang.String layoutURL,
                                                   java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Class<? extends Attribute>> classesToMerge,
                                                   java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> namedObjectsToMerge)
                                            throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                                   IllegalActionException,
                                                   NameDuplicationException,
                                                   java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        Merge the model with layout.
        Parameters:
        modelURL - The URL to the model.
        layoutURL - The URL to the layout.
        classesToMerge - The classes that need to be merged.
        namedObjectsToMerge - The named objects that need to be merged.
        Returns:
        the merged model.
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - if there is a problem merging the model.
        IllegalActionException - if there is a problem merging the model.
        NameDuplicationException - if there is a problem merging the model.
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - if there is a problem merging the model.

                                     throws IllegalActionException
        Open a MoML file, parse it, and the parsed model.
        Parameters:
        url - The url of the model.
        Returns:
        The parsed model.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - If the parsing failed.

      • stripFullName

        public static java.lang.String stripFullName(java.lang.String fullName)
        Strips the first part of a compound element name, including the "." at the beginning.
        Parameters:
        fullName - The compound name of an element.
        Returns:
        The stripped name of the element, where the first part of the compound name is removed, including the "." at the beginning.

      • validateModelAndLayout

        public LayoutValidationErrors validateModelAndLayout(java.lang.String modelURL,
                                                     java.lang.String layoutURL)
        Validate the model and layout and return list of errors that might prevent merging.
        Parameters:
        modelURL - The URL of the model.
        layoutURL - The URL of the layout.
        Returns:
        the list of the layout validation errors.
